description:
Being called out on the carpet takes on new meaning when your boss is Aiden Starr. She is a very horny executive that takes great pride in her company, and when Lobo falls out of line he is called into her office for official disciplinary measures.
Corporal punishment is just the beginning of Lobo's lunch hour. After being beaten by the beautiful executive, he is tied to the desk and fucked in the ass with her strap on. His cock is then accosted by her hungry cunt as she takes her time fucking him and riding his face till she is satisfied by screaming orgasms.
title: The Boss's Office
